thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Continental Holdings Says Unit To Sell 50% Of Wealth Plus

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Continental Holdings Says Unit To Sell 50% Of Wealth Plus

organizations.name: brief-continental holdings says unit to sell

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Continental Holdings Ltd:
* APPLICATION MADE TO STOCK EXCHANGE FOR RESUMPTION OF TRADING IN SHARES OF CO ON STOCK EXCHANGE FROM 9:00 A.M. ON 25 JAN
* UNIT TO SELL 50 PCT OF ISSUED SHARES OF WEALTH PLUS AND 50 PCT OF SHAREHOLDER LOANS OWING BY WEALTH PLUS​
* CONSIDERATION FOR DEAL IS EXPECTED TO BE ABOUT HK$1,308 MILLION
* GROUP EXPECTS TO RECORD GAIN FROM DISPOSAL (BEFORE TAX AND EXPENSES) OF ABOUT HK$439 MILLION
* ‍CONSIDERATION SHALL BE SETTLED IN CASH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
